original_text: The Assyrians will be terror-stricken at the voice of the Lord, when he strikes with his rod.
korean_text: 여호와의 목소리에 앗수르가 낙담할 것이며 주께서는 막대기로 치실 것이라

sentences.original_text: The Assyrians will be terror-stricken at the voice of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 사람들은 주의 목소리에 공포에 질릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: when he strikes with his rod.
